item.description:
Hike Bear Brook State Park
Sunday Apr. 10th. 1pm. til 4
Bear Brook State Park
157 Deerfield Road
Allenstown, NH 03275
http://www.nhstatepar...
603-485-9869

Host: Steve Obermiller 603-491-1962  ob@tds.net
THIS EVENT IS CANCELED. IF IT IS RAINY, SNOWY, TOO COLD OR TOO WINDY.
RAIN DATE SUNDAY APR 17TH.
Host: Steve Obermiller 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net


A Dog & Kid Friendly event.
Pets: Leashed pets are permitted in the campground on the trails only, not in the day-use area. Service animals are exempt from this policy.

We did this event last year, and had planned for an easy hike of and hour or so. But, it was wet and icy, and difficult at best. We also had only 6 people RSVP for this event. We ended up with 17 people join us. Who all said they really enjoyed the 3+ hours of hiking, and the difficulties we over came. So, please join Steve O. and friends for an easy. Yes. an easy 1 1/2 to 3 hour hike, on the many trials of this beautiful woodland park. We will meet in the park by the little park enterence house on the right side, just off of Deerfield rd.. We will park along the road or in the small parking area.
Call Steve O. for more info..

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Hike Bear Brook State Park
